16  package org.kuali.kfs.module.external.kc.document;
17  
18  import java.util.ArrayList;
19  import java.util.List;
20  import java.util.Map;
21  
22  import org.kuali.kfs.integration.cg.service.AccountCreationService;
23  import org.kuali.kfs.module.external.kc.KcConstants;
24  import org.kuali.kfs.module.external.kc.businessobject.AccountAutoCreateDefaults;
25  import org.kuali.kfs.sys.context.SpringContext;
26  import org.kuali.kfs.sys.document.FinancialSystemMaintainable;
27  import org.kuali.rice.kns.document.MaintenanceDocument;
28  import org.kuali.rice.kns.maintenance.Maintainable;
29  import org.kuali.rice.kns.web.ui.Field;
30  import org.kuali.rice.kns.web.ui.Row;
31  import org.kuali.rice.kns.web.ui.Section;
32  
33  public class AccountAutoCreateDefaultsMaintainableImpl extends FinancialSystemMaintainable {
34  
35      /**
36       * @see org.kuali.rice.kns.maintenance.KualiMaintainableImpl#getSections(org.kuali.rice.kns.document.MaintenanceDocument,
37       *      org.kuali.rice.kns.maintenance.Maintainable)
38       */
39      @Override
40      public List getSections(MaintenanceDocument document, Maintainable oldMaintainable) {
41          List<Section> sections = super.getSections(document, oldMaintainable);
42          boolean isNew = document.isNew();
43  
44          for (Section section : sections) {
45              for (Row row : section.getRows()) {
46                  List<Field> updatedFields = new ArrayList<Field>();
47                  for (Field field : row.getFields()) {
48                      if (isReadOnly(field, isNew)) 
49                          field.setReadOnly(true);
50                      if (shouldIncludeField(field)) {
51                          updatedFields.add(field);
52                      }
53                      
54                  }
55  
56                  row.setFields(updatedFields);
57              }
58          }
59          return sections;
60      }
61  
62      private boolean isReadOnly(Field field, boolean isNew) {
63          if (KcConstants.AccountCreationDefaults.KcUnit.equals(field.getPropertyName())) {
64              if (!isNew)
65                  return true;
66          }
67          return false;
68      }
69  
70      private boolean shouldIncludeField(Field field) {
71          return true;
72      }
73  
74      /**
75       * @see org.kuali.rice.kns.maintenance.KualiMaintainableImpl#processAfterCopy(org.kuali.rice.kns.document.MaintenanceDocument,
76       *      java.util.Map)
77       */
78      @Override
79      public void processAfterCopy(MaintenanceDocument document, Map<String, String[]> parameters) {
80          super.processAfterCopy(document, parameters);
81          // clear the pre-tag details when coyping pre-tag information
82          AccountAutoCreateDefaults newAcctAuto = (AccountAutoCreateDefaults) document.getNewMaintainableObject().getBusinessObject();
83          newAcctAuto.setKcUnit("");
84          newAcctAuto.setKcUnitName("");
85      }
86  
87  }
